Package org.cloudifysource.dsl

Copyright (c) 2011 GigaSpaces Technologies Ltd.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Plugin All USM plugins implementation should implement this interface.
 

Class Summary
Application Domain POJO for an Application recipe.
AppSharedIsolationSLADescriptor This class defines a service deployment which is shared across all machines that are provisioned for the same application in the cluster.
ComputeDetails Domain Object for compute settings required for a specific service.
DataGrid Defines an elastic deployment of a partitioned data grid (space).
DedicatedIsolationSLADescriptor This class defines a dedicated service deployment.
GlobalIsolationSLADescriptor This class defines a service deployment which is shared across all machines in the cluster.
IsolationSLA  
IsolationSLAFactory Factory class for creating service deployments easily.
MaxSizeList<T> Created with IntelliJ IDEA.
Memcached Domain POJO for a XAP Memcached deployment.
MirrorProcessingUnit Domain POJO for a XAP Mirror PU.
PluginDescriptor Domain POJO for a plugin descriptor.
Service The POJO for a service running in Cloudify.
ServiceLifecycle Domain POJO of the service lifecycle, part of the Service Recipe declaration.
ServiceNetwork Configuration of network elements of a specific service.
ServiceProcessingUnit The abstract class ServiceProccessingUnit holds all the data shared by the different processing units i.e.
SharedIsolationSLADescriptor This class defines a service deployment which is shared.
Sla an SLA for processing unit deployment.
StatefulProcessingUnit Defines an elastic deployment of a processing unit that contains an embedded space.
StatelessProcessingUnit Defines an elastic processing unit deployment that does not contain a space.
StorageDetails Domain Object for storage settings required for a specific service.
TenantSharedIsolationSLADescriptor This class defines a service deployment which is shared across all machines that are provisioned for the same tenant in the cluster.
 

Enum Summary
LifecycleEvents enum for lifecycle events.
 

Annotation Types Summary
DSLValidation An annotation marking a method in a Cloudify DSL POJO as a validation method, which will be executed after the object has been fully initialized.
